de.akquinet.android.androlog.reporter
Interface Reporter

All Known Implementing Classes:
MailReporter, NoopReporter, PostReporter
public interface Reporter

Reporter Interface. A Reporter sends a Report to a specific endpoint (url, mail ...). Reporter instances are created by Log according to the Log.ANDROLOG_REPORT_REPORTERS configuration property.

Method Summary
 void configure(Properties configuration)
          Configures the reporter.
 boolean send(android.content.Context context, String message, Throwable error)
          Asks the reporter to send the report.
 

Method Detail

configure

void configure(Properties configuration)
Configures the reporter. Each reporter can define their own configuration properties.

Parameters:
configuration - the Androlog configuration.

send

boolean send(android.content.Context context,
             String message,
             Throwable error)
Asks the reporter to send the report.

Parameters:
context - the Android context
message - a message (optional)
error - a error to attach to the report (optional)
Returns:
true if the report was sent correctly, false otherwise.
